term.title: relative hardness

item.text: The difference between the values of the absolute hardnesses (η) of a given molecule and the corresponding reference structure (η a): η r = η- η a. The values of relative hardnesses correlate well with the resonance energies of cyclic compounds and may be used as an index of aromaticity.
